content:
Sure thing! Here's a more casual and fun version:

"Hey there, I'm all for taking things slow and getting to know each other. I totally get not being into hook-ups or marriage, that's not my thing either. And I'm cool with being friends with benefits, cuddling included. I'm down for more frequent meet-ups if we hit it off, but I totally understand if you need space too. No pressure.

I totally relate to the struggle of being an introvert and getting exhausted quickly. I'm all for being transparent and clear, so I really appreciate the message you drafted. And don't worry, I won't overload your inbox. I'm a one-convo-at-a-time kind of guy.

I'm all for calls over texts and I'm happy to turn off my notifications for this. Let's chat and see where things go!"
